      Bezier(boolean aboveArc)
      A Bezier is instantiated defining just its convexity

      The Beziers are instantiated defining the control points for PVectors at (0,0).

      Bezier 2D

      The Beziers are instantiated defining the control points of origin and destination PVectors that are passed later in the show method.

        public Bezier getBezierThird(processing.core.PVector A,
                             processing.core.PVector cA,
                             processing.core.PVector cB,
                             processing.core.PVector B)
        based on http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18655135/divide-bezier-curve-into-two- equal-halves Set A to the anchor you want to be the source
        Parameters:
        A - The start or end of the bezier curve
        cA - The control point of A
        cB - The control point of B
        B - The opposite end of the bezier curve
        Returns:
